hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select column_name as COLUMN_NAME, IF(LENGTH(column_comment)=0,column_name,column_comment) as COMMENTS, data_type as DATA_TYPE from information_schema.columns where table_name=:tableName and table_schema=:tableSchema
select TABLE_NAME, TABLE_COMMENT as COMMENTS from information_schema.tables where table_name in :tableName and table_schema='${getSystemProperties('multi.tenancy.tenant.database_name')}'
select TABLE_NAME from information_schema.tables where table_name like :tableName and table_schema='${getSystemProperties('multi.tenancy.tenant.database_name')}'
select 1 from information_schema.columns where table_name=:tableName and column_name=:columnName and table_schema='${getSystemProperties('multi.tenancy.tenant.database_name')}'
